= Introduction =
Welcome to the world of JPublish. This is a world of truly dynamic web applications - not just dynamic for your customers but dynamic for your developers too. JPublish provides a powerful system for managing your web site's content as well as your web site's application logic. Let's jump right in then...

    * RESTful services (actions) via a [http://code.google.com/p/jpublish/wiki/RESTful JPRestlet module] supporting the [http://www.restlet.org/about/introduction RESTLET] framework.
    * RESTful services supporting the [http://incubator.apache.org/wink/ Apache Wink ] library. A JPublish [http://code.google.com/p/jpublish/source/browse/ module]
